title: Cannot build Xamarin.Android packages on Windows.
body:
On windows, I can only build the UWP libraries.
When running

`.\bootstrapper.ps1 -target externals-android`
I get: 

> Error: Could not reach target 'externals-android' since it was skipped due to a criteria.

According to the readme, the android build can only be run on [mac]
Why is this? 
I would really like to make a private nuget package as miguel kindly added some methods that I was missing (SKMatrix.Invert, etc)

The full output is:
`PS D:\Code\SkiaSharp> .\bootstrapper.ps1 -target externals-android
